Im not sure what the problem is. It says im seeding on my end.
Im fairly new to this guys, so work with me. Utorrent says im uploading this at roughly 4.0 kB/s

i am now at 70% and using bitlord. health says 0% and seed 0/21.

can u increase your upload ratio to 100kb/s and see how it goes?

Ok, set it to 100kb/s. Im bouncing anywhere between 4.3 kB/s to 35.5 kB/s. Im trying to get this up for ya guys, it took  me forever to find a copy of it too. If ya get tired of my nonsense, i found it at torrentday.com

thanks tim23. Actually what you did seems to help a lot since i went from 70% to 83% when i left this morning. way better then before.

Still not the fastest torrent but at least I can see that i will get it eventually.

again thanks for your upload and responding to our comments.
@xoxo45, no problem. Thank you for working it out with me and not just flaming me to death.
